item.title: Plumbing - PicoCTF Write-Up
item.description: Introduction HelloðŸ‘‹ Today we’re going to take a look at the challenge Plumbing on PicoCTF by Alex Fulton & Danny Tunitis. The difficulty is medium. Challenge Description Sometimes you need to handle process data outside of a file. Can you find a way to keep the output from this program and search for the flag? Connect to jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 4427. Solution When we connect to jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 4427 we’re given a bunch of lines saying this is not the flag.
